title: Define Project Requirements and Goals
description: Gather and document project requirements and goals from stakeholders.

title: Design Platform Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the platform architecture considering frontend, backend, and database components.

title: Develop Frontend Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for the frontend of the platform.

title: Implement Backend APIs and Services
description: Create the backend API endpoints and services to support the platform's functionality.

title: Set Up Database Schema and Models
description: Create the database schema and models to store platform data.

title: Configure DevOps and Deployment Strategies
description: Set up continuous integration/continuous deployment pipelines and infrastructure for the platform.

title: Create Unit Tests for Backend Services
description: Write unit tests to ensure the backend services function as intended.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create user documentation for the platform.

title: Review and Approve RFCs
description: Review and approve RFCs submitted by the team.

title: Perform Security Audits
description: Conduct security audits to ensure the platform meets necessary security standards.
